def battery_efficiency(battery_capacity, battery_charge, total_driven_distance):
    return total_driven_distance * (battery_capacity - battery_charge)

def battery_efficiency(battery_capacity, battery_charge, total_driven_distance):
    return total_driven_distance // (battery_capacity - battery_charge)

def battery_efficiency(battery_capacity, battery_charge, total_driven_distance):
    return total_driven_distance / (battery_capacity + battery_charge)

def battery_efficiency(battery_capacity, battery_charge, total_driven_distance):
    return total_driven_distance / (battery_capacity * battery_charge)
